column3: Beleaguered crypto lender Celsius deposited $500 million in WBTC, a bitcoin derivative product of the Ethereum blockchain, to crypto exchange FTX just hours after it repaid its debt to the decentralized lending protocol Maker.  @sndr_krisztian reports   https://t.co/sDuKgdfXzb
MARKET WRAP:Bitcoin (BTC) lifted above $21,000 for the first time in over a week and was up 7.2% over the past 24 hours in Thursday trading. @JimmyHe32 reports  https://t.co/FZgMMyviDG

NEW: @USTreasury developed a framework for international crypto regulation as a response to U.S. President Joe Biden's spring executive order on digital assets.   @nikhileshde reports   https://t.co/OLlDxm7Mlp
Latin American exchange @Bitso launched a remittance service in Colombia using cryptocurrencies, akin to the feature it rolled out in Mexico in 2021.   @andresengler reports  https://t.co/cxMdFO92V7

"Taxation is extremely high in Japan," @bitFlyer's Takaaki Kato says, "if that were to change ... it would be a big catalyst for crypto."  He dives into crypto in Japan, looking at investor movements, regulation and more. Presented by @kucoincom:  https://t.co/5DH04iEXJW  https://t.co/2ylzMhJXLy

üì∫ LIVE: A look at the Web3 and crypto hackathon communities.  Joining @bitcoinzay on "Community Crypto": ‚Ä¢ @cradl_org co-founder @triciawang ‚Ä¢ @HackerEarth VP Ellis Norman ‚Ä¢ @API3DAO dev @Ashar2shahid ‚Ä¢ @BNBCHAIN investment director @gwendolynregina  https://t.co/N3zNZEJbDI

U.S. officials who invest in crypto are now barred from working on crypto-related policies.  "It does feel kind of inevitable," CoinDesk's @nikhileshde says.  He discusses more details as well as the lawsuit facing @solanalabs, presented by @trondao:  https://t.co/KMPL8k0Dpl  https://t.co/6ZsaiZJN8Z

NEW: @TPSCapital, believed to be the trading arm of Three Arrows Capital, is now distancing itself from the troubled crypto investment firm‚Äôs principals @Zhusu and @KyleLDavies. @0x_bae reports.  https://t.co/xjHWkP0pOf

With #ether leading the way among #altcoins plus a look at what may trouble DeFi in the future, CoinDesk‚Äôs ‚ÄúMarkets Daily‚Äù is back with the latest news roundup.  Tune in here:  https://t.co/7pnLoYgqVR

üì∫ LIVE: 3AC contagion continues, @BorisJohnson's exit puts UK's crypto ambitions on hold and exploring crypto market sentiment in Asia.  @QCPCapital's Darius Sit and @ChainstoneLabs' @brucefenton join "All About Bitcoin" on  https://t.co/Z6qM18U7vL:  https://t.co/OFruzgx2sL

"For us, this is the future of collaboration," says  @KPMG_Canada's Kareem Sadek, discussing the consulting firm's metaverse ambitions.  Watch the full discussion plus his tips on navigating crypto contagion, presented by @Nexo:  https://t.co/zUoNIZbaTV  https://t.co/1IP2CET5ve

Despite the crash, the world of crypto continues to entice traditional finance execs, with @GalaxyDigitalHQ bringing on a former Credit Suisse managing director.  @mikeybellusci reports.  https://t.co/qsqY1nAJuY
The @FDICgov is reportedly looking into @investvoyager's claims that its customers were protected by FDIC insurance.   @nikhileshde reports  https://t.co/4B4Gz5yCvY

"The Brazilian user is looking more for opportunity in crypto, trying to make money and grow their wealth" while Argentinian users seek "safety and a store of value," @RipioApp's @sserrano44 says.   He dives into adoption in Argentina amid high inflation:  https://t.co/AMuLc66N0D  https://t.co/0ia2cjAcd6

Math whiz and poker enthusiast @ivan_bezdomny has harnessed the power of machine learning for everything from professional baseball to human genomics. Now he's coming for NFTs.  Profile by @elitanjourno    https://t.co/qYhUOzXYze

Spanish crypto exchange @Bit2Me plans to hire 250 people in the next 12 months to double its headcount. The company also has MOUs in place for three acquisitions.   @andresengler reports  https://t.co/RXXyyBazAQ
#Ethereum privacy app @TornadoCash just announced it will fully open-source the Tornado Cash Classic user interface. @FrederickMunawa reports.  https://t.co/gHSR7hOE4P
Catch a vibe with @2chainz, @trspalding of @flexaHQ, and @zackseward as they talk about albums, NTFs  and ‚Äúblockchainz.‚Äù   https://t.co/m1FthvIj4e

Recent turmoil in both the traditional and crypto markets suggests the centralized world may have had its day.   The next generation of Web3 platforms built with decentralization at their core will lead the new wave.  Sponsored content by @trondao:  https://t.co/uX396qYhbS
